document.full_text: south africa's main opposition made gains thursday in local government polls that could indicate frustration with the anc, which has ruled africa's largest economy for almost 20 years since apartheid ended.
document.title: south africa opposition gains ground in local polls
lines_and_colors: south africa's main opposition made gains thursday in local government polls that could indicate frustration with the anc, which has ruled africa's largest economy for almost 20 years since apartheid ended.
